description:
17 years old, and a second-year student at Seisho Academy. Lu`s twin brother. An excellent student, and athletic as well. He dislikes Daisuke for the childish way he`s acting now that his dream of being a hero is coming true. But in fact, just like Daisuke he remembers the prophecy Milo gave him: "Doubt everything." He has the capability to be a cool and collected leader, a talent he puts to good use in the S.D.S. (Shibuya Defense Service).
Source: Official page
name: Chang Gai Steiner
